duties_responsibilities.duty: Maximize personal sales and profitability by providing optimum level of customer service and applying non-negotiable sales standards.
Demonstrate how new products can mix with existing stock and previous purchases, and communicate product and customer feedback to managers.
Apply Point of Sale knowledge to process needed transactions and handle multiple customers at fitting rooms following all policies and procedures.
Demonstrate effective phone etiquette through customer service and follow through with customer experience by utilizing thank you cards, business cards, and maintaining client book.
Ensure ease of customer experience through visual presentation and overall store maintenance, including cleaning, vacuuming, folding, sizing, steaming, and replenishing as assigned.
Actively participate in all merchandising activities including stock maintenance, order processing, stock receiving, product transfers, folding, and floor changes.

Maintain a professional appearance consistent with established dress code and image guidelines while actively supporting securing company assets through effective Asset Protection in compliance with company policies and procedures.
